title: Understanding Empirical Research
text: Empirical research is based on observed and measured phenomena. It derives knowledge from actual experience rather than from theory or belief.

title: Characteristics of Empirical Research
text: Empirical research involves collecting data through direct and indirect observation or experience. It is often used to test a hypothesis or to explore a new area of research.

hintAnswer: scholarly work from actual observation and measurement of experience, in contrast to theory
